title: Oak View Plans $3 Billion Las Vegas Entertainment Hub
itunes:title: Oak View Plans $3 Billion Las Vegas Entertainment Hub
description:
Oak View Group CEO Tim Leiweke discusses the company's plans to build an arena just south of the Las Vegas Strip, serving as the centerpiece of a new entertainment hub that includes a casino and hotel.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
